metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000236 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
Node-cookie-signature before 1.0.6 is affected by a timing attack due to the type of comparison used.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-1000236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-cookie-signature - 1.1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-cookie-signature package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.0-2').
